docs.text:
Awards





Please use the following icons for determining the status of Awards.


Red - No awards 


Yellow - Awards needed, not yet ordered.


Blue - Use this for 
AC
 series events that do not utilize DockDogs Awards.


Green - Awards have been ordered.








Posted









Red - 


Yellow - 


Blue - 


Green - All pre-requisites have been met. Event has been posted to our website.



Yellow - 


Blue - 


Green - 




Insurance





Red - 


Yellow -


Blue - 


Green - Insurance has been ordered.

docs.title: FAQS

docs.text:
Introduction



There are 3 pre-built sponsors reports available already configured inside of Smartsheet. These have pre-defined schedules assigned to them which will send an email to each sponsor on a weekly basis. An example report can be found 
below
. 


Selecting A Sponsor



In order to have an event show in the 
SPONSORSHIP REPORTS
 you need to designate which sponsor will have their dock at the event. This can be done by using the 
SPONSOR
 column inside of Smartsheet. 


Confirmed Versus Tentative Status



Only events with the 
GREEN
 or 
YELLOW
 status fields selected in the 
POSTED
 column will be included in these reports. This ensures that sponsors are only notified of events that have been 
POSTED
 on the 
DockDogs
 website and opened for registration.




Example Sponsorship Reports





Blue Buffalo Sponsorship Report Example
docs.title: Pre-Built Sponsors Report

docs.text: There are 3 pre-built sponsors reports available already configured inside of Smartsheet. These have pre-defined schedules assigned to them which will send an email to each sponsor on a weekly basis. An example report can be found  below .   Selecting A Sponsor   In order to have an event show in the  SPONSORSHIP REPORTS  you need to designate which sponsor will have their dock at the event. This can be done by using the  SPONSOR  column inside of Smartsheet.   Confirmed Versus Tentative Status   Only events with the  GREEN  or  YELLOW  status fields selected in the  POSTED  column will be included in these reports. This ensures that sponsors are only notified of events that have been  POSTED  on the  DockDogs  website and opened for registration.   Example Sponsorship Reports    Blue Buffalo Sponsorship Report Example
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text:
Contracts 
 Deposits Report



This report shows all events and the status of their 
CONTRACT
 and 
DEPOSIT
 being received and processed by DockDogs.






Contracts 
 Deposits Report Example




Reconciled Report



This report shows the status of an event reconciliation being completed for specific events. This is a quick way for Theresa, Teresa, 
 Grant to know if an event has been reconciled, is waiting to be reviewed, or is not yet ready for a review.




Reconcilied Report Criteria


Event Series
 is: Affiliated Club, Facility Series, Fun Jump, Club Event @ Facility


Event End Date
 is in the past.


A status has been entered for the 
Reconciled
 column in the corresponding row.






Reconciled Report Example
